document.discussion_title: West Ham 1-0 Bournemouth: Eddie Howe admits Harry Arter red card costly
document.topic_text: Bournemouth boss Eddie Howe pinpoints Harry Arter's red card as the moment which cost his side in their 1-0 Premier League defeat by West Ham . »
document.post: Bournemouth boss Eddie Howe pinpoints Harry Arter's red card as the moment which cost his side in their 1-0 Premier League defeat by West Ham . »
